mdRecord.dcterms:title: Mount Vernon
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Rudolf Lesch Fine Arts, Inc.
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Black and white mounted silver print of the east front of the Mount Vernon Mansion, 1930s. The balustrade is present so the photograph was taken prior to 1936. A label affixed to both the front and reverse of the mount reads: American Architecture, Washington, George (1732-1799) and Others, 'Mount Vernon,' c. 1743-1787, Wooden Paneling in Imitation of Rusticated Stone, L. 96 ft., W. 30 ft., Fairfax Co., Potomac River. A ink stamp on the reverse reads: Picture Supplied and Mounted by Rudolf Lesch Fine Arts, Inc. 225--V Ave., New York. [C-14]
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: p Mansion exterior
p east front
p east lawn
p piazza
